title: The Strongest Witch in the World Has Started ~ I Can Live Freely in the World Where I Can Only See the “Capture Site” ~ - Novel Updates
author: Sakaki Mochimaru   坂木持丸
description:
“It’s a shame to awaken SSS rank skills .”

Lorna, a fallen girl who was abandoned from her parents’ household due to such a misunderstanding.

She had no money, no food, no power, and she thought she had no choice but to die.

“… Wiki?”

Lorna learns how to use the SSS rank-specific skill [Internet], which wasn’t understood at first.

It was a cheat skill that allowed you to see different world knowledge-and the “capture site” of this world.

When she tried to follow the strategy on [Internet], she could easily get a mythical class weapon.

“Oh, maybe I’m the strongest in the world?” 

How to get equipment and skills, information behind the scenes of nations and people, even the system of this world- all of this you can learn with this skill.

In this way, Lorna, who suddenly became the strongest in the world, unknowingly shakes the world by relying on her skill, [Internet].>
